description: Astronomers have confirmed a rare rogue planet, drifting without a star nearly 10,000 light-years away. Using gravitational microlensing, their distance and mass were measured, suggesting that free-floating planets may be abundant across the Milky Way. Upcoming telescopes, including NASA’s Roman Space Telescope and China’s Earth 2.0 mission, are expected to uncover more of these starless worlds.
title: Astronomers Detect Rare Rogue Planet Drifting Alone 10,000 Light-Years from Earth

description: NASA’s IXPE has made a breakthrough by measuring a white dwarf star. The findings have revealed fresh details about X-Ray emissions, formations of matter, and more within the Binary system.
title: NASA’s IXPE Creates History: Becomes First to Measure a White Dwarf Star

description: Akhanda 2 Thaandavam is a Telugu Fantasy Action Thriller film that will drop on Netflix very soon. The film stars Nandamuri Balakrishnan in the lead role.
title: Akhanda 2: Thaandavam OTT Release Date Revealed: Know When to Watch This Telugu Fantasy Action Film Online

description: Angammal is a Tamil drama film that explores the themes of independence, rural societal norms, and modern civilization. Streaming soon, only on SunNXT.
title: Angammal OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch This Tamil Drama Film Online

description: Experiments show RNA, a crucial molecule for life, could form naturally on early Earth with borates stabilising ribose and aiding phosphate production. Protoplanet impacts may have delivered RNA ingredients, supporting the RNA world hypothesis and suggesting life’s building blocks could emerge efficiently on Earth and potentially Mars.
title: New Experiments Suggest RNA Could Have Formed Naturally, Supporting ‘RNA World’ Origin of Life Theory

description: Spain’s military communications satellite, SpainSat NG-2, was struck by a space particle while moving toward geostationary orbit. The incident occurred at an unusually high altitude, and the damage remains unknown. Operators have activated contingency plans as engineers assess whether the €2 billion mission can still be completed.
title: Space Particle Collision Raises Uncertainty Over Spain’s New Military Satellite

description: The Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026, the trade show, began on Tuesday, on January 6. Various tech giants announced and unveiled their new devices, including smart TVs, laptops, and smart home appliances, during the event. Additionally, rumours regarding what will be showcased during the trade show also started surfacing online recently. The event will be held in Nevada's Las Vegas Convention Center (LVCC), and will run through January 9.
title: CES 2026 Roundup: All the Top Announcements and Noteworthy Products Launched on Day 2

description: Realme is reportedly returning to Oppo’s fold nearly seven years after it established itself as an independent company. As per the report, the Chinese smartphone maker is integrating with Oppo to pool resources and reduce overlapping costs in various operations. With this move, Realme will reportedly once again operate as a sub-brand of Oppo, alongside OnePlus.
title: Realme to Come Under Oppo's Umbrella Years After Separation: Report
A Legacy in Motion: OPPO Reno15 Series Will Bring the Next Chapter in Reno’s Camera Journey

description: Apple is said to begin mass production of the iPhone 17e shortly after CES 2026. The upcoming handset is said to compete against the lower-priced flagships. It is said to come with a 6.1-inch display with Dynamic Island. The refresh rate could remain the same as iPhone 16e. The iPhone 17e is said to run on a downgraded version of the A19 chip.
title: iPhone 17e With 6.1-Inch Display and Dynamic Island to Enter Mass Production Soon, Tipster Claims

description: iQOO Z11 Turbo will be launched in China on January 15 at 7pm local time (4:30pm IST), the Chinese smartphone maker announced on Wednesday. The Vivo sub-brand has also teased that the handset will feature a new proprietary Q2 e-sports chip. The iQOO Z11 Turbo is confirmed to be powered by Qualcomm’s octa core Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, which is built on a 3nm process. A company executive recently announced that the phone will feature a 200-megapixel “ultra-clear” rear camera. It is teased to feature a dual rear camera unit.
title: iQOO Z11 Turbo Launch Date Announced: Expected Price Range, Specifications and More

description: Samsung delivered some grim news amid the ongoing festivities at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026 in Las Vegas. On the second day of the event, a company executive reportedly said that the ongoing memory chip shortage is increasing, and it might force Samsung to reprice its devices in the coming days.
title: Why Samsung Says Memory Shortages Will Make Every Gadget Pricier

description: Nothing sub-brand CMF has been registered as a legally incorporated independent entity in India, an official announced on Wednesday. The transition from a Nothing subsidiary to a standalone entity was first made official in September, when the company confirmed the transfer of its end-to-end smartphone manufacturing operations to India. This announcement arrives a week prior to the launch of two new CMF products — CMF Headphones Pro and CMF Watch 3 Pro, in the country.
title: “Built from India, to the World," Says Akis Evangelidis, As CMF Incorporates as an Independent Indian Subsidiary

description: Infinix, during the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026, showcased its various new technological innovations that it will bring with its upcoming lineup of smartphones. Infinix demonstrated its new always-on satellite communication solution, which will allow users to call and message in areas with poor cellular connectivity. Additionally, the company showcased HydroFlow Liquid Cooling Architecture and Active Visual Backplate technology, which features a bladeless fan to maintain temperature.
title: CES 2026: Infinix Showcases Always-on Satellite Communication, Bladeless Fan Technologies

description: Razer has entered the AI devices race with Project Ava, a holographic desktop companion unveiled at CES 2026. It features a 3D mini avatar that reacts to users, powered by xAI’s Grok models. The device targets gaming on Windows, supports screen analysis via USB-C, and is now open for reservations at $20. It will be shipped in the second half of 2026.
title: CES 2026: Razer Unveils Project Ava, an Echo-Like AI Holographic Device for Gamers

description: Noise Master Buds 2, tuned with Sound by Bose technology, have been launched at the CES 2026. The new earphones are confirmed to be available for purchase globally by the end of February. The earphones will be offered in two colour options. The new model will succeed last year's Noise Master BudS. The existing model has 12.4mm drivers, LHDC audio codec support, and Adaptive Active Noise Cancellation (ANC).
title: Noise Master Buds 2 With Sound by Bose, Familar Design Unveiled at CES 2026

description: OnePlus is reportedly working on the successor to the OnePlus 13T. The upcoming OnePlus 15T is said to come with a 7,500mAh battery. It is tipped to feature a 6.3-inch display and a 3D ultrasonic fingerprint sensor. This model could have a metal frame and a 50-megapixel Samsung JN5 telephoto camera. The OnePlus 13T has a 6,260mAh battery.
title: OnePlus 15T Specifications Leaked; Tipped to Launch With Notable Battery Upgrade

description: Xbox Game Pass is starting 2026 with a bang. The game subscription service will add two major titles this month: Star Wars Outlaws and Resident Evil Village. The two games will be available to Game Pass members across Cloud, PC, and Xbox consoles on January 13 and January 20, respectively
title: Star Wars Outlaws and Resident Evil Village Are Coming to Xbox Game Pass in January

description: Lenovo announced the expansion of its consumer-grade laptops and PCs at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026 on Wednesday. The company introduced refreshed Yoga Pro 9i Aura Edition and Yoga Pro 7i Aura Edition, powered by the latest Intel Core Ultra Series 3 chipsets. The IdeaPad Pro 5i and IdeaPad 2-in-1 Series models have also been updated with either Intel Panther Lake CPUs or Snapdragon X2 Plus processors, depending on the variant.
title: CES 2026: Lenovo Yoga, IdeaPad Laptop Models Updated With Latest Intel, AMD and Snapdragon Chips

description: Honeymoon Se Hatya is a gripping true-crime docuseries streaming on ZEE5 from January 9, 2026. Covering some of India’s most shocking real-life cases, the series uses interviews and narration to uncover the stories behind the crimes that shocked the nation.
title: Honeymoon Se Hatya OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Shiboyugi: Playing Death Games to Put Food on the Table is an upcoming Japanese anime thriller series whose English version is soon landing on Crunchyroll.
title: Shiboyugi: Playing Death Games to Put Food on the Table OTT Release Date Revealed

description: Tron: Ares is an American Sci-Fi Film that follows the rivalry between digital programmes that will get intense and is packed with action sequences.
title: Tron: Ares Out on OTT: Know Everything About Streaming, Plot, Cast, and More

description: YouTube Music is dealing with a wave of AI-generated songs cluttering Explore and recommendations, frustrating listeners trying to discover new artists. Users say disliking tracks or resetting history has not helped filter them out. Similar issues are being noted on Suno-driven platforms like Spotify and Amazon Music, highlighting a broader AI music discovery challenge.
title: YouTube Music Users Raise Concerns Over AI-Generated Songs Flooding Their Recommendations

description: IO Interactive has revealed the PC system requirements for its upcoming James Bond game, 007 First Light. The studio also unveiled a collaboration with Nvidia, confirming the game will support Nvidia DLSS 4 with multi frame generation on PC.
title: 007 First Light PC System Requirements Revealed; IO Interactive Partners Nvidia for DLSS 4 Support on PC

description: Apple will equip its rumoured iPhone 21 series with a 200-megapixel camera on the back, according to a research note seen by AppleInsider. While the lineup is expected to launch in 2028, following the rumoured unveiling of the 20th anniversary iPhone models next year, its specifications and features have started surfacing online. Apple will reportedly acquire the 200-megapixel CMOS camera sensor from Samsung, as Sony’s technology could not meet Apple’s requirements. This would be a significant upgrade over the iPhone 17 Pro series, which features a triple 48-megapixel rear camera setup.
title: Apple's iPhone 21 Series to Get Much-Awaited Camera Upgrade Available on Rival Android Phones: Report

description: Ayalaan is a Tamil Sci-Fi film that is currently streaming on AhaVideo. The film explores the themes of adventure, friendship, and drama.
title: Ayalaan Telugu Version Streaming Now Online: Everything You Need to Know About Plot, Streaming, Cast, and More

description: Can This Love Be Translated? is a charming Netflix K-drama starring Kim Seon-ho and Go Youn-jung. The story follows a globally successful actress and her multilingual interpreter whose professional relationship slowly turns into something deeper.
title: Can This Love be Translated OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Romantic Series Online?

description: Lenovo has launched new Legion 7a, Legion 5i, and Legion 5a models at CES 2026. The company has also announced the Lenovo LOQ 15AHP11 and the Lenovo LOQ 15IPH11 models. They will go on sale in April this year. The Legion 7a features AMD’s latest Ryzen AI 400 Series processors and Nvidia GeForce RTX 50-Series graphics.
title: CES 2026: Lenovo Legion 7a Unveiled Alongside New Legion 5i, Legion 5a and LOQ Series Models

description: Motorola made several major announcements on Tuesday at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026, which is currently being held in Las Vegas. The company has also expanded the Moto Things lineup, the company’s umbrella branding for its peripheral devices. Four new devices, including the Moto Sound Flow, Moto Watch, Moto Pen Ultra, and the Moto Tag 2, were introduced.
title: CES 2026: Motorola Things Lineup Expanded With Moto Sound Flow, Watch, Pen Ultra and Tag 2

description: Watch Kalamkaval on Sony LIV, a gripping Malayalam crime thriller starring Mammootty. What begins as a routine investigation in a small village turns into the hunt for a shocking serial killer. Packed with suspense, strong performances, and a realistic crime-drama tone, this film is a must-watch for thriller lovers.
title: Kalamkaval OTT Release Confirmed: Where to Watch Mammootty Starrer Online?

description: Spring Fever is a cosy, heart-touching Korean romance drama streaming on Prime Video. Adapted from Baek Min-a’s web novel, it tells the story of Yoon Bom, a woman who leaves Seoul after a brutal breakup and meets Seon Jae-gyu, a gentle and sincere man whose presence slowly heals her guarded heart.
title: Spring Fever Now Available For Streaming Online: What You Need to Know

description: Asus has launched new Asus ProArt PZ14, Zenbook Duo and Zenbook A16 laptops at the CES 2026. The new laptops come with the latest processors from Qualcomm and Intel. The Asus ProArt PZ14 features a 14-inch 3K OLED touchscreen display, while the Asus Zenbook Duo comes with a dual-screen design with two 14-inch OLED displays. The Asus Zenbook A16 features a 16-inch 3K OLED display.
title: CES 2026: Asus ProArt PZ14 With Snapdragon X2 Elite SoC Launched Alongside Zenbook Duo and Zenbook A16

description: Lenovo showcased a slew of proof-of-concept products at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026 on Wednesday. Among the highlights is the Lenovo ThinkPad Rollable XD Concept, which features a rollable screen that expands vertically when more workspace is needed. The brand also unveiled the Personal AI Hub Concept, touting it as a central, on-device artificial intelligence (AI) ecosystem. Other announcements included Lenovo AI Glasses Concept, AI-powered display concepts, and several smart accessory concepts.
title: Lenovo ThinkPad Rollable XD Laptop Showcased Alongside New Concept Devices at CES 2026

description: Oppo Reno 15 series is set to launch in India on January 8. Recently, dedicated microsites for the lineup, which will include the Reno 15, Reno 15 Pro Mini, and Reno 15 Pro, were made live on Amazon and Flipkart to confirm their availability in the country via the two e-commerce platforms. A day before their unveiling, the prices in India and the storage options of the upcoming Reno 15 series phones have surfaced online. Separately, the tech firm has updated the microsites to confirm the chipset and battery capacity of the phones.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series Price in India Leaked a Day Ahead of January 8 Launch: Expected Features, Specifications

description: Lenovo has unveiled a SteamOS version of its second-generation gaming handheld, the Legion Go 2. The new variant will come with the same hardware specifications as the original model, swapping out Windows for the more intuitive SteamOS interface made by Valve. The SteamOS-powered Lenovo Legion Go 2 will be available from June 2026.
title: Lenovo Legion Go 2 SteamOS Version Revealed at CES 2026, Will Be Available From June 2026

description: Motorola’s showcase at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026 included two major AI announcements. First is Qira, the Lenovo-owned company’s unified AI platform that preserves context and memory when the user moves from one device to another. The second is Project Maxwell, a wearable companion device built on the Qira platform. It is currently a proof of concept with no launch date in sight.
title: Motorola Unveils Unified AI Platform and AI Pin-Styled Wearable Device Prototype at CES 2026

description: OnePlus Turbo 6 series is set to arrive in China January 8. Currently available for pre-order in the country via the Oppo China online store, the lineup is confirmed to include the Turbo 6 and Turbo 6V models. Ahead of its unveiling, the tech firm has revealed that the two handsets will be equipped with a BOE display, which will offer up to 165Hz of refresh rate, with Bright Eye Protection, 100 percent DCI-P3 colour gamut, and up to 1,800 nits of peak brightness. Additionally, the company has confirmed that the OnePlus Turbo 6V will be powered by a Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 chipset.
title: OnePlus Turbo 6 Series Confirmed to Feature BOE Displays With Up to 165Hz Refresh Rate

description: Eureka has launched the Z50 and E10 Evo Plus robotic vacuum cleaners at CES 2026. New robot vacuum cleaners are launched along with the FloorShine 890 stick vacuum. The Eureka Z50 robotic vacuum offers both dry and wet floor cleaning. The Eureka Z50 is Eureka’s flagship robot vacuum and mop combo, featuring an instant roller washing system that sprays fresh water onto the mop roller while simultaneously suctioning away dirty water.
title: CES 2026: Eureka Z50, E10 Evo Plus Robot Vacuum Cleaners Launched, FloorShine 890 Tags Along

description: iQOO Z11 Turbo will be launched by the Vivo sub-brand in China in January. Recently, a company executive confirmed the price range, ingress protection (IP) ratings, and chipset, among other details about the phone. Now, the tech firm has revealed the battery capacity and charging speed that the iQOO Z11 Turbo will feature. Separately, a tipster has leaked the camera specifications of the upcoming handset, suggesting that it might feature a 32-megapixel front-facing camera for selfies and video calls.
title: iQOO Z11 Turbo Battery, Charging Details Confirmed; Tipster Leaks Camera Specifications

description: The Motorola Razr Fold was announced at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026 on Wednesday. It debuts a new form factor in the Lenovo-owned brand’s smartphone portfolio, joining the Razr Flip as just the second foldable model. The company claims it is designed to adapt to the user’s world with flexible layouts and interfaces. The Motorola Razr Fold sports an 8.1-inch inner screen and a 6.6-inch cover display.
title: CES 2026: Motorola Razr Fold Announced With 2K LTPO Inner Display, 50-Megapixel Triple Cameras

description: Motorola finally unveiled the Motorola Signature phone at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) on Wednesday, bringing a culmination to weeks of anticipation. The latest handset from the Lenovo-owned brand is the first product in the new Motorola Signature series, featuring a contoured design, an aircraft-grade aluminium frame, and twill linen-inspired textures. The Motorola Signature is equipped with four 50-megapixel cameras and packs a 5,200mAh battery.
title: Motorola Unveils Signature Phone With Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Chip and 50-Megapixel Sony LYTIA Cameras: Price, Specifications
